Tempareture of the city in degree as double unit 30.0
Tempareture of the city in farenheit as double unit 86.0
Trigger api response to get the temprature from reponse
The temperature received from the api response is 306.15 in pascal unit
Coverted temperature received from api response to degress is 33.0
Coverted temperature received from api response to farenheit is 91.4
Verify temerature for degrees received in ui 30.0 along with the tempreature received in api response 33.0 is falling under permissable variance of 5.0
The temperature received from the api response is 299.64 in pascal unit
Coverted temperature received from api response to degress is 26.49000000000001
Coverted temperature received from api response to farenheit is 79.68200000000002
Verify temerature for degrees received in ui 24.0 along with the tempreature received in api response 26.49000000000001 is falling under permissable variance of 5.0
Verify temerature for farenheit received in ui 86.0 along with the tempreature received in api response 91.4 is falling under permissable variance of 5.0
Verify temerature for farenheit received in ui 75.0 along with the tempreature received in api response 79.68200000000002 is falling under permissable variance of 10.0
